Name: team_must_be_cross_functional
Description: The team must possess skills in all required categories

Name: feature_must_have_acceptance_criteria
Description: No user story can be started without defined acceptance criteria

Name: sprint_must_have_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a defined and clear goal

Name: task_cannot_be_unassigned
Description: All tasks in the sprint backlog must be assigned to a worker

Name: po_must_be_available
Description: The Product Owner must have high availability during the sprint

Name: blocker_must_be_high_severity
Description: Only blockers with severity above 'Medium' require immediate escalation

Name: release_must_be_on_roadmap
Description: A release plan must be part of the long-term roadmap

Name: worker_may_have_certified_skills
Description: Workers are encouraged but not required to have certified skills

Name: sprint_cannot_exceed_timebox
Description: The duration of a daily scrum meeting cannot exceed 15 minutes

Name: snapshot_must_pass_tests
Description: The development snapshot must have a test status of 'Passed' before release
